HeaderFilter Class Reference

This is the mail header filter. Call check() with some header datas of the mail to get the configured action for this mail. If the settings was changed by the config GUI you have to call load(). More...

Detailed Description

This is the mail header filter. Call check() with some header datas of the mail to get the configured action for this mail. If the settings was changed by the config GUI you have to call load().

Author:
Ulrich Weigelt <ulrich.weigelt@gmx.de>
